title: Unsubscribe from Grammarly emails
content:
Youâ€™re free to opt out of marketing and certain other Grammarly emails (like product announcements and Grammarly Insights) at any time.
To update your email preferences, please
sign in
to Grammarly, click
Account
and navigate to the
Profile
tab. Then click
Update
under
Email Preference
. Alternatively, you can find an unsubscribe link at the bottom of most emails from Grammarly.
Note:
You will continue to receive emails related to billing, login credentials, and account security even if you unsubscribe from all other Grammarly emails.
